channel.title: Using Capitals in RS Username
channel.description:
Hey all,
I don't have a very huge problem but I can't find the solution to it anywhere on the web. So, I thought of asking it here.
My problem:
I wan't to use a characters name at my server which has more than one capital;
Like: "YouTube", instead of "Youtube".
[i]Somebody knows an answer to my problem? Please let me know :)[/i]
Thanks.
